value.string:
<tal:block tal:define="group_dict python: options.get('group_dict');
 max_level python: options.get('max_level');
 		 column_width python: options.get('column_width') ;
 		 is_report_tree_mode python: options.get('is_report_tree_mode');
 		 selection python: options.get('selection') ;
 		 level python: options.get('level')
 		 		 " >
 					
 <tal:block tal:repeat="listboxline python: group_dict['line_list']">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()">
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1];
 column_id python: column_item[0];marie python:here.log('papa',column_width)">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_title python: column_width">
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_id==column_title ">
 <table:table-column 
 	 tal:attributes='table:style-name python: column_id'/>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: listboxline.isTitleLine()">
 	 
 	 <table:table-row table:style-name='TableRowTitle'>
 	 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: is_report_tree_mode==1 " >
 	
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellTitle' >
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: selection.getReportPath().capitalize()">Id</text:p>
 	</table:table-cell>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python:max_level-1 != 0 "> 
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellTitle' tal:attributes=' table:number-columns-repeated python:max_level-1'/>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 </tal:block> 
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()">
 	
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1];
 column_id python: column_item[0]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None ">
 	 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellTitle'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: here.Localizer.erp5_ui.gettext(str(column_property)).encode('utf8')">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None ">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellTitle'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python:''">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 	 </table:table-row> 
 </tal:block>
 <!-- <tal:block tal:repeat="section python:range(1,max_level+1)">-->
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:listboxline.getSectionName() or listboxline.isDataLine()">
 <table:table-row table:style-name='TableRowContents'>
 <tal:block tal:condition="listboxline/getSectionName">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:listboxline.getSectionDepth()!= 1 "> 
 
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection4' tal:attributes='table:number-columns-repeated python: listboxline.getSectionDepth()-1'/>
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection3'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="listboxline/getSectionName">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:max_level-listboxline.getSectionDepth()!= 0 "> 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection1' tal:attributes=' table:number-columns-repeated python: max_level-listboxline.getSectionDepth()'/>
 </tal:block>
 	
 
 </tal:block>
 	
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:listboxline.getSectionDepth()== 1">
 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection1'>
 <text:p tal:content="listboxline/getSectionName">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:max_level-listboxline.getSectionDepth()!= 0 "> 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection1' tal:attributes=' table:number-columns-repeated python: max_level-listboxline.getSectionDepth()'/>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 
 	 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: listboxline.isDataLine() ">
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()==[] ">
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellContents' tal:attributes=' table:number-columns-repeated python: len(column_width)'/>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 
 	 
 	 
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()">
 	 
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1];
 column_id python: column_item[0]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None ">
 	 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellContents'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: str(column_property)">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None ">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellContents'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python:''"></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 	 
 	 
 	 
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>	 			
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: listboxline.isDataLine() and listboxline.getSectionName()==None and listboxline.getColumnItemList()!=[] ">
 	 
 	 
 	 
 	 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellSection4' table:number-columns-repeated='2' tal:attributes='table:number-columns-repeated python: max_level ; marie python:here.log("marie",max_level)'/>
 	 
 <tal:block tal:repeat="column_item python: listboxline.getColumnItemList()">
 	 
 <tal:block tal:define="column_property python: column_item[1];
 column_id python: column_item[0]">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is not None ">
 	 
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellContents'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python: str(column_property)">Id</text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 <tal:block tal:condition="python: column_property is None ">
 <table:table-cell table:style-name='TableCellContents'>
 	 <text:p tal:content="python:''"></text:p>
 </table:table-cell>
 	 </tal:block>
 	 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 	 
 	 
 	 
 </tal:block>
 </table:table-row>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 		
 
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:level==1 ">
 	
 <tal:block tal:repeat="sub_group_dict python: group_dict['group_dict_list']">
 
 <tal:block tal:content=" structure python:here.listbox_parent_mode(group_dict=sub_group_dict,max_level=max_level,column_width=column_width,selection=selection,level=level+1)" />
 
 </tal:block> 
 	
 
 </tal:block>
 
 <tal:block tal:condition="python:level > 1 and level <=max_level ">
 	<table:table-row-group>
 <tal:block tal:repeat="sub_group_dict python: group_dict['group_dict_list']">
 
 <tal:block tal:content=" structure python:here.listbox_parent_mode(group_dict=sub_group_dict,max_level=max_level,column_width=column_width,selection=selection,level=level+1)" />
 
 </tal:block> 
 	
 <table:table-row-group>
 </tal:block>
 
 
 </tal:block>
